commit.message:
re PR c++/84446 (ICE with broken lambda)

/cp
2018-02-20  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/84446
	* parser.c (cp_parser_init_declarator): Don't call start_lambda_scope
	on error_mark_node.

/testsuite
2018-02-20  Paolo Carlini  <paolo.carlini@oracle.com>

	PR c++/84446
	* g++.dg/cpp0x/lambda/lambda-ice27.C: New.

From-SVN: r257841
